snippet: A Curtis Davies own goal gifted West Ham United a point after  Hull City had twice taken the lead in a frenetic 2-2 draw in the Premier League on Monday....

headline.print_headline: Hull's New Boys Score but West Ham Take a Point
headline.main: Hull's New Boys Score but West Ham Take a Point

lead_paragraph: A Curtis Davies own goal gifted West Ham United a point after  Hull City had twice taken the lead in a frenetic 2-2 draw in the Premier League on Monday.
